page.title: 14Fruit Farms, Wickhambreaux.
page.content: The farms in the{Grove Road}area are dominantly fruit farms. At the farm where my dad works they have two {strawberry}crops, one in the summer and one in the autumn; after the summer crop the tops are cut off the plants and they grow again. This June the strawberries were late because a {colorado beetle}was found last year so the crop had to be replanted. The{apples, pears}and{strawberries are picked by hand and{blackcurrants are picked with a machine that is borrowed from another farm. There are about twenty fields of{apples}and{ {pears.}My mum is in charge of the nursery for the workers' children. My dad's boss farms four holdings, at Wickhambreaux, Westmarsh, Wingham and Grove; the managers have walkie talkie radios to communicate with each other.
